General.Name: Beta Systems Software AG
General.Description: Beta Systems Software AG develops software products in Germany and internationally. The company offers data center intelligence solutions, including output management and document archiving, workload automation, log management, quality management, service and change management, and access rights management; access right management solutions; identity and access management solutions for banking, insurance, health care, and public sectors. It also provides IT operations management solutions, such as network management and security, and system and asset management; and IT services, including product development engineering, software development, and test engineering. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.
